item.description:
"How does your business do from the client's perspective? From the moment they land on your Web site until a year after closing, does the client feel like they are the focus of your business or the afterthought? If your answer isn't the former, you'd better get busy changing your message and your systems, otherwise you may be surprised to find that you have become the afterthought."

The above excerpt is from Kelle Sparta, author of The Consultative Real Estate Agent - Building Relationships that Create Loyal Clients, Get More Referrals, and Increase Your Sales (listed as a "Must Read" by REALTOR Magazine in July 2006). Kelle is also a speaker, trainer, coach, and founder of Sparta Success Systems, a real estate training company that provides tools, products, and training to empower agents and brokers to create lives and businesses they can love. For more information about Kelle Sparta, please go to http://www.spartasucc....

Network with like minded individuals and professionals!

"It's Time to Move Up" networking events are designed to be unique by combining business networking, social networking and continuing education. Check out the website at http://www.itstimetom... for more information.


Event Agenda

6:00pm - 7:00pm -> Open Networking
7:00pm - 7:10pm -> Introduction
7:10pm - 7:30pm -> Special presentation (changes every month)
7:30pm - 9:00pm -> Open Networking

Appetizers will be served... Check out the venue website at http://www.fuji1546.c... for more information.

It's time for a change... It's Time to Move Up!

Make it a great day,
Ruben
raustria@maximamortgages.com
item.name: It's Time to Move Up! September Meetup
